title: Chat is Stacking?!?!
body:
My league chat is stacking on each other like this

Sir Sexy: Hurry up, Finish.
who u playin with?
ok
hurray
add me to call
LeeSin Shrimp: wait then 
thomas

This is how it is ment to be 

Sir Sexy: Hurry up, Finish
LeeSin Shrimp: wait then
Sir Sexy: who u playin with?
LeeSin Shrimp:  thomas
Sir Sexy: ok
Sir Sexy: hurray
Sir Sexy: add me to call

How do i fix this??

Thank You.

replies.body:
Hey Sir Sexy,

As far as I'm aware, this is not an isolated issue and is happening to a good number of Summoners. As such, I recommend you post whatever information you can in the [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) sub-boards so that the Dev Team can work towards resolving this issue. Thanks!
